attributes.action: re-instate Sarah Bexon as our dedicated account manager.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sarah Bexon has been our account manager at eBuyer for many years.

She has gone out of her way to help us wherever possible.

For some reason, the bosses of eBuyer don't seem to realise how important a dedicated account manager is to a customer.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
